original_text: In those days, people thought that Ahithophel's words were as good as a message from God. So Absalom trusted Ahithophel as his advisor, as David had done too.
korean_text: 그 때에 아히도벨이 베푸는 계략은 사람이 하나님께 물어서 받은 말씀과 같은 것이라 아히도벨의 모든 계략은 다윗에게나 압살롬에게나 그와 같이 여겨졌더라

sentences.original_text: that Ahithophel's words were as good as a message from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 아히도벨의 말이 하나님으로부터 온 메시지만큼 좋다고.

sentences.original_text: So Absalom trusted Ahithophel as his advisor,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 압살롬은 그를 자신의 조언자로 믿었다.
